A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A poor excuse for a Star Wars  film. Picks up all the threads of plot seeded in 7 and gives 'em a good yank before setting them on fire. The new director seemed only to want to ruin everything the last director set up. Nothing pays off\, every plot point is ruinously misused\, And hey... The only living original character is the only dead actor... Go figure.
